languages.text: "Для этого вы и здесь, не так ли? Узнать, почему мир охвачен тревогой, эфир полнится вокс-передачами... Любой ответственный администратор придет в беспокойство, ибо нарушение привычных процессов ведет к... впрочем, неважно".

"That is why you are here, is it not? To learn why the world is distressed, why the air is charged with vox-transmissions... Any administrator worth their station would be concerned — disruptions to established processes always lead to... Well, no matter."
languages.original_text: "Для этого вы и здесь, не так ли? Узнать, почему мир охвачен тревогой, эфир полнится вокс-передачами... Любой ответственный администратор придет в беспокойство, ибо нарушение привычных процессов ведет к... впрочем, неважно".

"That is why you are here, is it not? To learn why the world is distressed, why the air is charged with vox-transmissions... Any administrator worth their station would be concerned — disruptions to established processes always lead to... Well, no matter."

languages.text: "Deshalb seid Ihr hier, oder nicht? Um zu erfahren, warum die Welt in Aufruhr und die Luft voller Vox-Nachrichten ist ... Jeder Administrator, der seiner Station würdig ist, wäre besorgt ... Störungen etablierter Prozesse führen immer zu ... Na ja, egal."
languages.original_text: "That is why you are here, is it not? To learn why the world is distressed, why the air is charged with vox-transmissions... Any administrator worth their station would be concerned — disruptions to established processes always lead to... Well, no matter."

traits.locale_text: "Deshalb seid Ihr hier, oder nicht? Um zu erfahren, warum die Welt in Aufruhr und die Luft voller Vox-Nachrichten ist ... Jeder Administrator, der seiner Station würdig ist, wäre besorgt ... Störungen etablierter Prozesse führen immer zu ... Na ja, egal."

languages.text: « C'est ce qui vous amène ici, n'est-ce pas ? Vous voulez savoir pourquoi ce monde est en détresse, pourquoi l'air est saturé de transmissions-vox... Tout administrateur digne de ce nom serait inquiet, car il va de soi que les perturbations des processus établis entraînent toujours... Ah, mais je m'égare. »
languages.original_text: "That is why you are here, is it not? To learn why the world is distressed, why the air is charged with vox-transmissions... Any administrator worth their station would be concerned — disruptions to established processes always lead to... Well, no matter."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ce qui vous amène ici, n'est-ce pas ? Vous voulez savoir pourquoi ce monde est en détresse, pourquoi l'air est saturé de transmissions-vox... Tout administrateur digne de ce nom serait inquiet, car il va de soi que les perturbations des processus établis entraînent toujours... Ah, mais je m'égare. »

languages.text: “您来这里就是为了这个原因，是吧？您想了解这个世界为什么处于动乱之中，为什么到处充斥着音阵讯息……每位称职的管理员都会对这类情况忧心忡忡，因为当既定流程遭到干扰时，这往往意味着……嗯，先不谈这个。”
languages.original_text: "That is why you are here, is it not? To learn why the world is distressed, why the air is charged with vox-transmissions... Any administrator worth their station would be concerned — disruptions to established processes always lead to... Well, no matter."

traits.locale_text: “您来这里就是为了这个原因，是吧？您想了解这个世界为什么处于动乱之中，为什么到处充斥着音阵讯息……每位称职的管理员都会对这类情况忧心忡忡，因为当既定流程遭到干扰时，这往往意味着……嗯，先不谈这个。”

languages.text: «A eso ha venido, ¿no? A saber qué pasa en el planeta, por qué el aire está cargado de transmisiones de voco... Cualquier administrador digno del cargo se preocuparía. Una perturbación del proceso establecido siempre lleva a... bueno, no importa».
languages.original_text: "That is why you are here, is it not? To learn why the world is distressed, why the air is charged with vox-transmissions... Any administrator worth their station would be concerned — disruptions to established processes always lead to... Well, no matter."

traits.locale_text: «A eso ha venido, ¿no? A saber qué pasa en el planeta, por qué el aire está cargado de transmisiones de voco... Cualquier administrador digno del cargo se preocuparía. Una perturbación del proceso establecido siempre lleva a... bueno, no importa».

languages.text: 「それがあなたがここにいる理由ではないのですか？なぜ惑星が危機に瀕しているのか、なぜ空気がヴォックス通信で満たされているのかを知るために…その職務にふさわしい管理者なら誰でも心配するでしょう。確固たるプロセスへの混乱は常に…まあ、関係ありません」
languages.original_text: "That is why you are here, is it not? To learn why the world is distressed, why the air is charged with vox-transmissions... Any administrator worth their station would be concerned — disruptions to established processes always lead to... Well, no matter."

traits.locale_text: 「それがあなたがここにいる理由ではないのですか？なぜ惑星が危機に瀕しているのか、なぜ空気がヴォックス通信で満たされているのかを知るために…その職務にふさわしい管理者なら誰でも心配するでしょう。確固たるプロセスへの混乱は常に…まあ、関係ありません」

languages.text: "Burada olmanızın sebebi de tam olarak bu değil mi? Dünyanın neden bu kadar diken üstünde olduğunu, havanın neden voks çağrılarıyla dolup taştığını öğrenmek... Makamına layık her idarecinin derdidir. Yerleşmiş süreçlerdeki pürüzler daima... Neyse, boş verin."
languages.original_text: "That is why you are here, is it not? To learn why the world is distressed, why the air is charged with vox-transmissions... Any administrator worth their station would be concerned — disruptions to established processes always lead to... Well, no matter."

traits.locale_text: "Burada olmanızın sebebi de tam olarak bu değil mi? Dünyanın neden bu kadar diken üstünde olduğunu, havanın neden voks çağrılarıyla dolup taştığını öğrenmek için... Makamına layık her idarecinin derdidir. Yerleşmiş süreçlerdeki pürüzler daima... Neyse, boş verin."
